name: Reduce Advantage
author: k5y1jEYMBqd9uLUx
command:
game.gmtoolkit.advantage.update(token, "reduce")

/* ==========
* MACRO: Reduce Advantage
* VERSION: 0.9.5
* UPDATED: 2022-08-04
* DESCRIPTION: Reduces Advantage for the selected token by 1 (to minimum 0).
* TIP: Token must be added to an encounter in the Combat Tracker.
========== */
